rows.label: qst700501_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, you lot. Hope you don't
mind me asking, but...

rows.label: qst700501_msg0002
rows.name:
Are you the ones who go around the
place helping people in need?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, I wouldn't exactly go that far...
but we do what we can, I suppose?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0004
rows.name: Good enough for me.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0005
rows.name:
Name's Dio. I'm the local handyman.
Listen, since you're here, can I ask
you a really huge favor?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0006
rows.name: This better be worth our time.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, I won't lie to you, it won't be
straightforward. Troubles of the heart
never are.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0008
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Troubles of the heart?!

rows.label: qst700501_msg0009
rows.name: Your troubles, I presume?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0010
rows.name:
No no, it's to do with a pal of mine,
actually. We share a table sometimes
down at the local.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0011
rows.name:
He wants to send a custom-made gift
to this lady who's caught his eye, but
that's not really my area of expertise...

rows.label: qst700501_msg0012
rows.name:
On top of that, one of the key
materials he needs is a rare ore
that you can only gather at night.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0013
rows.name:
I think I know the stuff!
Isn't that, uh, Purestone...?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0014
rows.name:
Hey, you sure know your geology!
You only get it at Hangnail Crossing,
and it's used to make Sweet Nothings.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0015
rows.name:
I...I think we should help them.
It's a wonderful thing to be able
to help love blossom!

rows.label: qst700501_msg0016
rows.name:
I guess we can help out. Besides,
it'd just feel weird to ignore it now.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0017
rows.name:
Be honest, Hikari. You want to see
how this romance pans out, don't you?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0018
rows.name:
Don't put words in my mouth
Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0019
rows.name:
All right, I think you've got the gist
of it. Here's everything you'll need
for the job.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0020
rows.name:
All that's left is to get the Purestone
and turn it into something gift-worthy.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0021
rows.name:
And, er, I hardly need to tell you this,
but it wasn't me who came up with
"Sweet Nothings", all right?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0022
rows.name:
"Sweet Nothings", indeed. Yet who's
to say the woman is even aware of
this man's affection?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0023
rows.name:
Yeah, it is kind of putting the cart
before the horse, isn't it? Anyway,
let's give this a shot, shall we?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0024
rows.name: Hey, you're here!

rows.label: qst700501_msg0025
rows.name: Ah, there you are.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0026
rows.name:
Fancy meeting you here!
What's the occasion?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0027
rows.name:
Dio-san here happens to be my
reading and writing tutor!

rows.label: qst700501_msg0028
rows.name:
It's a little part time job I do on
the side. Only when business is
slow, mind.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0029
rows.name:
No kidding. How long have you
been keeping that up?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0030
rows.name:
Never you mind about me. Just
go and get the ore I asked for and
we'll talk later, OK?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0031
rows.name: Have fun with whatever you're doing!
